title: Income Tax Update: AMC Repo Clearing Limited's Core Settlement Guarantee Fund Notified
content:
# Income Tax Update: AMC Repo Clearing Limited's Core Settlement Guarantee Fund Notified

Ek important update hai! Government ne Income-tax Act, 1961 ke Section 10(23EE) ke powers use karte hue AMC Repo Clearing Limited ke Core Settlement Guarantee Fund ko officially notify kiya hai.

Yahan kuch key details hain:

*   **Notification Number & Date:** Income Tax Department Notification No. 6/2026, issued on January 8, 2026.
*   **What's New:** Central Government ne AMC Repo Clearing Limited (a SEBI recognized clearing corporation) dwara establish kiye gaye Core Settlement Guarantee Fund (PAN: AAAJA3150B) ko notify kiya hai. Is notification ke through, is fund ki specified income Income-tax Act, 1961 ke Section 10(23EE) ke under exemption ke liye eligible hogi.
*   **Applicability:** Yeh notification Assessment Year 2024-25 aur uske baad ke sabhi assessment years ke liye effective hai.
*   **Conditions:** Yeh exemption tab tak valid rahegi jab tak Core Settlement Guarantee Fund, Section 10(23EE) ki conditions follow karta rahega. Isme Section 139(4C) ke according income tax return file karna aur AMC Repo Clearing Limited ka SEBI dwara recognised clearing corporation rehna shamil hai.
